# CHANGE [yoursitedomain.com] with you real site name! 

<IfModule mod_rewrite.c>
 RewriteEngine on 
 RewriteCond %{HTTP_REFERER} !^http://(www\.)?[yoursitedomain.com]/.*$ [NC]
 RewriteCond %{HTTP_REFERER} !^http://(www\.)?[yoursitedomain.com]$ [NC]
 RewriteRule .*\.(jpg|jpeg|gif|png|bmp|js|css|json)$ - [F]
 </ifModule>
